quote: Are you desperate or determined? With desperation comes frustration. With determination comes purpose, achievement, and peace….
author: James A. Murphy,  The Waves of Life Quotes and Daily Meditations

quote: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it’s determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: Accept yourself, your strengths, your weaknesses, your truths, and know what tools you have to fulfill your purpose.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: The living self has one purpose only: to come into its own fullness of being.
author: D.H. Lawrence,  Selected Essays

quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it's determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: Your determination and actions define your destination.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Success in any endeavor depends on the degree to which it is an expression of your true self.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: When you are living the best version of yourself, you inspire others to live the best versions of themselves.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it's the determination and commitment to unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: I don't think it's a Western thing to really talk about intrinsic motivation and the drive for autonomy, mastery and purpose. You have to not be struggling for survival. For people who don't know where their next meal is coming, notions of finding inner motivation are comical.
author: Daniel H. Pink

quote: Success is the progressive realization of predetermined, worthwhile, personal goals.
author: Paul J. Meyer

quote: If you wish to achieve worthwhile things in your personal and career life, you must become a worthwhile person in your own self-development.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Self-acceptance is pure power.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree,  The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: Self education is the key to self liberation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
author: Mark Caine

quote: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
author: Mark Cain

quote: Persistence, perseverance, and continuous improvement are the ingredients for forming a successful person.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Once you can let go of illusion and draw upon a more universal source of motivation then you will re connect with your true purpose on Earth.
author: Gary Markwick

quote: When you believe in yourself sufficiently and are confident that everything that you desire is inside you then you will possess the ability to produce all that you wish for.
author: Stephen Richards,  Be First: Achieve Every Dream

quote: The person who makes a success of living is the one who sees his goal steadily and aims for it unswervingly. That is dedication.
author: Cecil B. DeMille

quote: For the wise have always known that no one can make much of his life until self-searching has become a regular habit, until he is able to admit and accept what he finds, and until he patiently and persistently tries to correct what is wrong. – Bill W.
author: Bill W.

quote: The ethos of redemption is realied in self-mastery, by means of temperance, that is, continence of desires.
author: Pope John Paul II,  Blessed Are the Pure of Heart: Catechesis on the Sermon on the Mount and Writings of St. Paul

quote: This above all: to thine own self be true.
author: William Shakespeare,  Hamlet

quote: ‎Determination, effort, and practice are rewarded with success.
author: Mary Lydon Simonsen,  The Perfect Bride for Mr. Darcy

quote: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
author: Bill Bradley

quote: The ethos of redemption is realized in self-mastery, by means of temperance, that is, continence of desires.
author: Pope John Paul II

quote: An empowered life begins with serious personal questions about oneself. Those answers bare the seeds of success.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: If you are able to focus unswervingly on your goals, then all that you desire will become yours.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: The person who makes a success of living is the one who sees his goal steadily and aims for it unswervingly.
author: Cecil B. DeMille

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Ambition is the path to success, persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
author: William Eardley IV

quote: Live life with a purpose and live it full out.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Self-education is the greatest self-liberation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The aim of life is self-development. To realize one's nature perfectly - that is what each of us is here for.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Motivation gets you going; Inspiration keeps you going.
author: Todd Stocker,  Refined: Turning Pain Into Purpose

quote: The goal is to learn to be nurturing with yourself so you can feel free.
author: Deborah Day

quote: No matter how you define success, you will need to be resilient, empowered, authentic, and limber to get there.
author: Joanie Connell,  Flying Without a Helicopter: How to Prepare Young People for Work and Life

quote: Trust yourself. Create the kind of self that you will be happy to live with all your life. Make the most of yourself by fanning the tiny, inner sparks of possibility into flames of achievement.
author: Golda Meir

quote: Try for once to justify the meaning of your existence as it were a posteriori by setting yourself an aim, a goal... an exalted and noble 'to this end.' Perish in pursuit of this and only this
author: Friedrich Nietzsche,  Untimely Meditations

quote: It is not in life, but in art that self-fulfillment is to be found.
author: Wilson Mizner

quote: It is in the knowledge of the genuine conditions of our lives that we must draw our strength to live and our reasons for living.
author: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: You were put on this earth to achieve your greatest self, to live out your purpose, and to do it courageously.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: You learn a lot about yourself when you have success for a while. Like, a lot of things that you think are really important aren't. But you need that process.
author: Curtis Jackson

quote: You solely owe success and happiness to yourself. So why not make your inner-self proud of your daily decisions and actions?
author: Edmond Mbiaka

quote: Progress has always been achieved by probing well-entrenched and well-founded forms of life with unpopular and unfounded values. This is how man gradually freed himself from fear and from the tyranny of unexamined systems.
author: Paul Karl Feyerabend,  Problems of Empiricism: Philosophical Papers: Problems of Empiricism v. 2 (Philosophical Papers

quote: The formula of happiness and success is just, being actually yourself, in the most vivid possible way you can.
author: Meryl Streep

quote: Character — the willingness to accept responsibility for one's own life — is the source from which self-respect springs.
author: Joan Didion,  On Self-Respect

quote: Success is peace of mind, which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you made the effort to become the best of which you are capable.
author: John Wooden
